QuestData.Title: Called to the Throne
QuestData.Description: I was far from here in Talador when the voice called out to me.$b$bI looked around but found myself alone. Again, I heard the voice as if it were a breeze in my mind.$b$b"You are needed at the throne," it whispered.$b$bThe voice called itself Kalandrios, and it guided me to this place.$b$bI had never been here before, nor had I yet beheld these furies with my eyes; yet this feels strangely familiar to me as if it happened long ago in a forgotten dream.$b$bWe should greet the furies and hear them out.
QuestData.LogDescription: Commune with the furies at the Throne of Elements.
QuestData.CompletionText: Are you ready to commune with the elemental spirits of the throne?
QuestData.RewardText: I am not sure what to make of this.$b$bThe elements are no longer in balance? The great fury Gordawg is missing and must be found?$b$bThe furies appear noble, and deep within my soul their words ring true.$b$bI believe we should aid them in their cause.
